#"The Captain" "That Golden Rule" "'Bubbles'" "God and Satan" "Born on a Horse"
#"Mountains" "Shock Shock" "Many of Horror" "Booooom, Blast & Ruin" "Cloud of
#Stink" "Know Your Quarry" "Whorses"
}} }} '"Bubbles"' is the fifth single taken from Scottish rock band Biffy
Clyro's fifth studio album, [[Only Revolutions (Biffy Clyro album)|Only
Revolutions]]. Josh Homme from Queens of the Stone Age and Them Crooked Vultures
provides additional lead guitar in the song. Despite being one of the lower
charting songs from the album (reaching #34 on the UK singles chart), it has
spent more weeks in the top 100 than any other Biffy Clyro song.
